title: Solve for $$t$$ in the x(t) Equation
text: Solve for $$t$$ in the x(t) equation, we have $$t=\frac{-1}{2} \ln\left(x\right)$$

title: Substitute $$t$$ Into the y(t) Equation
text: Substitute $$t=\frac{-1}{2} \ln\left(x\right)$$ into the y(t) equation, we have $$y=2e^{\left(-\left(-\frac{1}{2} \ln\left(x\right)\right)\right)}=2e^{\frac{1}{2} \ln\left(x\right)}=2x^{\frac{1}{2}}$$
